mapper.select: select mwv.workflow_id, mwv.workflow_version, mwv.workflow_version_name, mwv.create_time, wimwrs.run_status as status, wimwrs.begin_time, wimwrs.end_time, wimwrs.id as workflowRunId, mw.create_mode from mo_workflow_version mwv inner join mo_workflow mw on mw.workflow_id = mwv.workflow_id left join ( select mwrs.id, mwrs.workflow_id, mwrs.workflow_version, mwrs.run_status, mwrs.begin_time, mwrs.end_time from mo_workflow_run_status mwrs where mwrs.id in ( select max(mwrs.id) as id from mo_workflow_run_status mwrs where mwrs.workflow_id = #{workflowId} group by mwrs.workflow_version ) ) wimwrs on (wimwrs.workflow_id = mwv.workflow_id and wimwrs.workflow_version = mwv.workflow_version) where mwv.workflow_id = #{workflowId} order by mwv.create_time desc
